title: 05/12/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 05/12/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin shares his excitement about the release of the NFL schedule by highlighting his favorite games from week 1 and why the NFL continues to separate itself from other pro leagues. He points out the main difference between the Lakers and the Knicks as we gear up for the playoffs. He tosses the old fashion and overly complex “QB Tiers” by putting each NFL QB into 2 very simple categories. Plus, former Washington tight end Chris Cooley joins the show to tell Colin if Tim Tebow really has a chance to succeed after not playing in the NFL for almost a decade. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
